comments:
description:
NPE thrown out when open an reprot file which doesn't exist in workspace

steps to reproduce:
1. open eclipse
2. delete a report file in the current workspace
3. open the reprot file

actual result:
NPE thrown out when open a reprot file which doesn't exist in defined path

exception stack trace:
